name: Arena - The deadly battle - 2030
description:
Arena - The Deadly Battle is a third-person action adventure game, a totally epic experience that everyone can fully explore and enjoy. You are a ball that throws balls at other balls (Your goal is to eliminate the five bosses) Each defeated Boss will be released a new power for your character. Coming soon, multiplayer!

GAME CONTROLS

FRONT: W

BACK: S

LEFT: A

RIGHT: D

SKIP: SECURE THE SPACE BUTTON

HURT: SECURE THE MOUSE RIGHT BUTTON

EXCHANGE OF WEAPONS: LETTER (Q) (E)

MOUSE: MOVES THE CAMERA

SUPER POWERS: (MOUSE RIGHT BUTTON) (MOUSE LEFT BUTTON)

SPECIAL WEAPON: LETTER (F)

RESTART THE GAME: LETTER (O)

EXIT: LETTER (P)
